name: Dribbble Profile Template
description:
Use this template to build and test your personal Dribbble Pro profile or the Dribbble Pro Business profile of your company. It's fast and easy thanks to drag and drop support for the avatar, masthead, and shots, as well as an editable name and headline. All images are prepared for export.


Features

  • Easy to customize
  • Test drive your shots
  • Supports Pro and Pro Business
  • Export single assets
  • Export the whole profile for alignment


Support

  • Follow me on Dribbble
  • Buy me a coffee
